filmJson.name: Super 16
filmJson.fact1: This version of 16mm uses one-sided perforation to have space for a wider image
filmJson.fact2: This was an adaptation of the 1.66 aspect ratio ("Paramount format") for 16 mm film
filmJson.fact3: There is no Super 16mm projector, so playing back this format means making special customizations or enlarging to 35mm
